meanings.meaning: to get no response from someone

meanings.meaning: to define a limit in anything

meanings.meaning: fulfilment of a wish after a long time

meanings.meaning: elaborately attired, dressed to draw attraction

meanings.meaning: a severe scolding or strong reprimand, usually from a superior

meanings.meaning: in small irregular quantities

meanings.meaning: this phrase means to drink heavily, which becomes worrisome

meanings.meaning: to disturb or irritate someone
meanings.example: He drives me crazy with the lazy way he executes all his tasks.

meanings.meaning: strongly emphasize or reinforce a point

meanings.meaning: annoy someone to the point of frustration or anger

meanings.meaning: to make someone angry or irritated

meanings.meaning: an informal visit

meanings.meaning: used to emphasize how charming something or someone is
meanings.example:
Extremely gorgeous:
"She walked into the room looking drop-dead gorgeous.".

meanings.meaning: many people falling ill or dying around the same time

meanings.meaning: an early rising person

meanings.meaning: it is too soon to make a judgment about something

meanings.meaning: rewards, progress or other good results with little or no effort

meanings.meaning: very straightforward
meanings.example: Just copy what I do. It's easy peasy.

meanings.meaning: being proven wrong after taking a strong stand
meanings.example: No that my brother has proved that I was wrong I will have to eat crow.

meanings.meaning: the show is ended and go home now

meanings.meaning: there is  nothing more to add to the matter under discussion

meanings.meaning: to look at all the possibilities and then to make a final decision

meanings.meaning: finally reach a particular place, situation, or condition, often unexpectedly

740.idiom: EVERY CLOUD HAS A SILVER LINING
740.idiom_shorten: EVERY CLOUD HAS A SILVER LINING

meanings.meaning: almost everything that one can think of

meanings.meaning: used to apologize for using profanity or offensive language

meanings.meaning: to make an offer of peace or settlement
meanings.example: After the argument, John decided to extend the olive branch and contact his friend to bury the hatchet.

meanings.meaning: attractive visually but uninteresting in other ways

meanings.meaning: accept punishment or consequences for one's actions
meanings.example: After skipping work for days, John had to face the music when his boss found out.

meanings.meaning: meeting or seeing someone in person

meanings.meaning: to not be strong enough to handle a situation
meanings.example: This movie is not for those who are faint of heart. You better go to bed right now.

meanings.meaning: someone who is only supportive or friendly during good times but disappears in difficult situations

meanings.meaning: a very healthy person

meanings.meaning: to display a very bad temper, often by screaming a lot

meanings.meaning: making choices guided by personal emotions and instincts instead of external advice

meanings.meaning: an idea or subject to think about

meanings.meaning: forever or permanently – Refers to something intended to last or remain indefinitely, with no plan of reversal or return

meanings.meaning: it represents unmet expectations, especially when it comes to promised reparations or compensation

meanings.meaning: make progress or advance in a particular area or situation

meanings.meaning: something extremely bitter, hateful, or offensive

meanings.meaning: the difference in opinions, values, or behavior between younger and older people

meanings.meaning:
to stop wasting a lot of time in useless or
boring or trivial works

meanings.meaning: get organized and on schedule

receiving
